dict.string: Tadpole is a small chorded keyboard about the size of a numeric keypad that can be used with one hand.
The Dvorak Simplified Keyboard has numerous properties designed to increase typing speed, decrease errors, and increase comfort
The Colemak keyboard layout is an alternative to the standard QWERTY layout, offering a more incremental change for users already accustomed to the standard layout
FITALY is a keyboard layout specifically optimized for stylus or touch-based input
